page.title: 17Transport:Peter Tavy Area
page.content: Buses are the only form of public transport in this area.Over half the people interviewed think that public transport is unsatisfactory.People use buses for school,work and social reasons.People use buses daily,weekly, monthly or only rarely.Those who use buses daily are school children who go on the school bus.People who use buses weekly in Peter Tavy go on the one bus which goes to Tavistock every Friday morning and returns in the afternoon as it is market day in Tavistock. People living on the A386 have a more frequent bus service as a bus goes four times daily from Tavistock to Brentor.This does not affect the proportion of people using it or who are dissatisfied with it.Most families have between one and three cars but some have none.
